title: Simplification Opportunity
comment: The logic for determining the port based on the protocol could be simplified by using a ternary operator instead of an if-else statement. This would improve code readability and reduce complexity.

title: Refactoring suggestion
comment: The connectToServer method is responsible for both establishing a connection and determining the server address. Consider separating these responsibilities into two separate methods to adhere to the single responsibility principle and improve maintainability.

title: Redundant comment
comment: The comment is redundant and adds noise to the code. Consider removing it to improve code clarity and maintainability.

title: Potential Performance Enhancement
comment: Consider using a larger buffer size to improve performance and reduce the number of read operations. This would minimize overhead and enhance the efficiency of content reception.

title: Error Handling Improvement
comment:
The error handling in the receiveHttpHeader method could be enhanced by providing more 
informative error messages for parsing errors or unexpected header formats. 
This would facilitate easier debugging and troubleshooting.
